display.title: Nano CPUs
description: &&aNano CPU Wafers&&r are made by infusing regular &&aCPU Wafers&&r with &&dGlowstone&&r and &&9Raw Carbon Fibers&&r.
They will be needed in large quantities when making the &&5Nano&&r line of Circuits.
Higher-tier polymers will increase your yield of &&9Raw Carbon Fibers&&r. One &&dEpoxy&&r is enough for a full stack.
&&9Tip:&&r Don't like mining &&dGlowstone&&r? Check out Redstone ore processing.
